articles.title: Algeria forest fires: At least 26 dead, minister says - BBC
articles.description: Countries on the Mediterranean have been ravaged by wildfires this summer, especially in Europe.
articles.content:
At least 26 people have been killed and dozens more injured in forest fires that have devastated northern Algeria.
Kamel Beldjoud, the country's interior minister, said 24 died in El Tarf, near the … [+1316 chars]
